title: What you say VS What Leona hears

replies.body:
false.

The only thing leo sees when anyone types is "Go More ham"

There is none of that run away nonsense.

>"Go More ham"
> 
> There is none of that run away nonsense.

{{champion:240}} would like a word with you.
the only thing kled sees in chat is a static message saying "tresspassers"
When playing Leona, remember ABD, Always Be Diving.
